posts.post_title: 90+ old mills received, scanned and priced
posts.post_content:
Thanks to all who have already gotten some....There are 20 sold, 26 are pending with one person and 50 still available.

If you would like the spreadsheet with prices, let me know and as mentioned above scans are available on request.  As usual, prefer communication to [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url] or 770 873 1181

available still  includes commons and some HOFers ; free shipping
ppgift or ck fine

posts.post_title: My best friend (4 legged) just died
posts.post_content: My 16 yr old Maltese Prince just died----will answer emails when possible a little later along with a funny story--Calvindog's dad--I know how you were when Calvin passed. This is a major bummer   Bill
Very sorry you lost your pal, my friend. I give you my most heartfelt sympathy. Sending Hungarian love to you my friend.
I'm really sorry to hear that.  Got a 14-year-old 4-legger snoring beside me, so I fully get what you must be going through.  I'm glad you got your years together.
